sourceMeaningMnemonic: In a <radical>hole</radical>, you see a <radical>big</radical> guy who looks like he wants to <kanji>stab</kanji> you. No <kanji>sudden</kanji> movements now, or you'll fall right in!
meaningInfo: Look at this hole – it’s like, super big. The guy is really big. They’re terrifying enough on their own, but put them together and you’ve got a big problem. You feel very afraid of this hole and getting stabbed. Just don’t fall in, okay?
readingMnemonic: You fall in the big hole. What did I say about <kanji>sudden</kanji> movements!? He’s <reading>totes</reading> (<ja>とつ</ja>) going to <kanji>stab</kanji> you for sure. Totes.
readingInfo: This big guy inside the big hole is totes going to stab you. Why did you fall in?? Feel the big guy press you up against the wall of the hole as he begins to stab you repeatedly.
